title: Experienced E-commerce Video Editor
job_overview:
Are you passionate about editing engaging and high performing UGC content? Do you thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environments where creativity is key? Join Nordic Sculpt as we build a worldwide beauty tech brand dedicated to bring integrity to the beauty industry. We’re two founders working alongside a third partner — one of the world’s top e-commerce experts and the founder of several well-known, successful brands like Hears and Dore & Rose. We are seeking a talented Video Editor Manager to enhance our paid advertising and engage our audience with top-tier.

Responsibilities:
• Edit, and deliver high-quality video content tailored for social media platforms.
• Work collaboratively with our team to develop cohesive and innovative video ad content strategies.  

Requirements:
• Proven experience in e-commerce paid ads video editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing your understanding of the field.
• Great understanding of paid ads, UGC content and etc.
• Solid understanding of paid ads dynamics and content strategies.
• Creative mindset brimming with ideas and a keen eye for detail.
• Excellent command of English, with exceptional communication skills.

What We Offer:
• Competitive compensation starting at $1000-$1800 per month for 35-40 hours per week, with the potential for bonus salary based on performance.
• The opportunity to grow within an inspiring brand and significantly impact our community.
• A collaborative work environment where innovation and creativity are encouraged. 

Not the Right Fit:
This position is designed for individuals with advanced experience in video editing for e-commerce paid ads and a strong portfolio of relevant work. If you do not have medium to advanced experience or a specific portfolio, this role may not be suitable for your current career stage. 

How to Apply:
Please send your CV and a brief introduction to Upgrade to see actual info - Include the word “Inspire” in the subject line to ensure your application stands out.

We are eager to welcome a new member to our team who is motivated, detail-oriented, and ready to contribute to our mission from day one. If you are looking to make a meaningful impact with a fast-growing brand, we look forward to hearing from you!
